metadata.title: CVE-2018-25091 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: urllib3 before 1.24.2 does not remove the authorization HTTP header whenfollowing a cross-origin redirect (i.e., a redirect that differs in host,port, or scheme). This can allow for credentials in the authorizationheader to be exposed to unintended hosts or transmitted in cleartext. NOTE:this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-20060 (whichwas case-sensitive).

criterions.comment: python-urllib3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
